data.text:
Katy Nichole Shares Powerful Story Behind Her New Song

You may already love Katy Nichole‚Äôs brand new song, ‚ÄúIn Jesus Name.‚Äù But, what you might not know is how this song came out of Katy‚Äôs journal entries after she was diagnosed with scoliosis.

When she came out of the second surgery on her spine, Katy thanked God for healing her physically and mentally. Her spine was healed and the cloud of depression was gone. She truly encountered the Lord in that moment.

Through that experience, the Lord had given her this song. But without being signed to a record label there was no hope for radio play or sharing her message, so she just put a video of her singing ‚ÄúIn Jesus Name‚Äù on the popular social media app, TikTok ‚Äì watch the viral clip below:

@katynichole_ Worship with me‚ù§Ô∏èüôåüò≠ #worship #worshipleader #worshipmusic #worshipsongs #christiantiktok #christian #christianity #fypp #fyp #jesus#voiceeffects ‚ô¨ In Jesus Name God Of Possible Demo ‚Äì Katy Nichole

The video went viral and before she knew it, radio stations started playing her song before she was even signed to a record label ‚Äì how amazing is that!?

Katy shared, if she could say one thing to people, it‚Äôs that God is a God of healing. God‚Äôs healed me, so I know He can heal someone else‚Äù.
